description: Detects when a memory process image does not match the disk image, indicative of process hollowing. Author: Christopher Peacock '@securepeacock', SCYTHE '@scythe_io', Sittikorn S. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
false_positives: There are no known false positives at this time
name: Sysmon Process Hollowing Detection
query: (Type:"Image\ is\ replaced" AND (NOT (process.executable:(*\:\\Program\ Files\\* OR *\:\\Program\ Files\ \(x86\)*) AND process.executable:(*\\chrome.exe OR *\\opera.exe OR *\\firefox.exe OR *\\MicrosoftEdge.exe))))
